main.privacy_cookies: PopUpDelivery uses cookies to give you the best experience on our website. By continuing to use the site, you agree to our policy on cookies usage.
main.tagline: Convert visitors to customers and subscribers.
main.subtagline: We deliver tools to boost your online store. We help your customers to buy your products faster and deliver new leads.
main.button_tagline: Easy installation · Try 14 days for FREE · Cancel any time · We do not require your credit card
main.section_contact_button: Have a questions? Click here to start a chat...
main.section_integration: Connect to All Your Marketing Tools
main.section_integration_more: Integrate PopUpDelivery with your email tools, social media tools, existing forms, or CRM. Add PopUpDelivery to your inbound marketing app stack.
main.section_pricing_vat: Additional VAT charges are added to purchases made by customers from the European Union, except for customers from the European Union, but outside of United Kingdom, who provide a valid VAT ID. Businesses from outside the European Union are not charged with VAT.
main.section_pricing_free: Try PopUpDelivery on your site for 14 days for FREE. If you find our apps helpful, you can subscribe to a monthly or yearly paid plan. You can always cancel your subscription at any time.
main.section_pricing_monthly: Fixed pricing with no hidden fees. Monthly payments. We don't change prices based on number of visitors or customers or generated traffic.
main.section_pricing_yearly: Check our promotions and get an extra 2 months if you will buy yearly paid plan now.
main.section_how_intro: Simple and quick installation. Create your free account and copy & paste a simple code on your site. This simple code will activate all the tools from PopUpDelivery that you need.
main.section_how_preview: See a demo. Just enter your website url to see how it looks like on your site.
main.section_how_preview_text: Enter your store website url, e.g. http://yourstoredomain.co.uk.
main.section_how_1: Install our code on your site to start using all tools from PopUpDelivery.
main.section_how_2: Upload your product catalogue to activate available tools.
main.section_how_3: Collect new leads and send mailings to your customers.
main.section_how_4: Display targeted messages, promo codes, coupons and banners.
main.section_how_5: Enable Product Reminder to your visitors and clients and allow them to access your products faster. This will improve your customers' shopping experience.
main.section_how_6: Review daily insights. Learn more about trending products and your customers
main.app_list_builder_tagline:
Welcome Popup helps you to collect leads and build mailing lists. It's displayed on the Home Page of your store. It's a most efficient tool to generate leads. Use this popup to engage your visitors and customers to subscribe to your newsletter, and to display recently added products and promotions.

A popup is a special window displayed to your customers at the right moment. It's a better way to communicate with your customers.
main.app_list_builder_about_1: Design your form using our Form Creator
main.app_list_builder_about_2: Collect new leads and build mailing lists
main.app_list_builder_about_3: Display messages about sales, promotions, discounts, coupons etc.
main.app_list_builder_about_4: Customise the colours to your brand and style with one click
main.app_coupons_intro: Product Popup helps you to personalise messages to your visitors and customers on selected product sites. You can display discount codes, coupons, sales alerts, banners and forms. It helps you to collect more information about your customers and their interest in your products. All gathered data is displayed in detailed insights.
main.app_coupons_about_1: Easily distribute discount codes, coupons for single products or groups of products
main.app_coupons_about_2: Decide when and where this popup will be displayed
main.app_coupons_about_3: Target specified groups of visitors or customers
main.app_coupons_about_4: Design your messages using forms, banners or text
main.app_coupons_about_5: Limit bounce rate and increase your sales
main.app_product_reminder_intro: Product Reminder helps your visitors and customers to access recently viewed products in your store. It supports your clients and helps them to access favoured products quickly and to buy products faster.
main.app_product_reminder_about_1: Your clients will have access to recently viewed products, including current prices and availability
main.app_product_reminder_about_2: You can analyse trending products and use all this insight data in your marketing

faqs.q1: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.q1_answer: We do offer a free trial. You can create an account, import and sync your data, customize templates and emails, and use many of PopUpDeliver’s features for free. You can create unlimited popups. You will be prompted to upgrade once your 14 days trial has ended.
faqs.q2: Do I have to sign a long-term contract?
faqs.q2_answer: No. PopUpDelivery is a monthly subscription service. There are no long-term contracts or commitments on your part. You simply pay month by month. If you cancel, you will be billed for the current month. You won’t be billed again
faqs.q3: When is my credit card billed?
faqs.q3_answer: We will charge your credit card on the day your subscription starts. The next charge will be on the same or nearest date of the following month.
faqs.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.q4_answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, Apple Pay, and Google Wallet. We do not currently accept Apple Pay, Google Wallet, Paypal, Amazon Payments, or any other providers that are not listed here.
faqs.q5: Is my credit card information secure?
faqs.q5_answer: PopUpDelivery processes payments with Stripe, a secure PCI Level One compliant service provider. Spring never touches your payment information or holds any sensitive information. Once your order has been placed, Stripe requests authorization from your bank. Your account will not be charged until your order has been shipped.
faqs.q6: What happens when I click 'Get Started'?
faqs.q6_answer: To install PopUpDelivery, you must first create a free account. We have a web app plugin. You need to activate first. After that, you are ready to create your first popup and activate all the available tools!
faqs.q7: How do I change my billing details?
faqs.q7_answer: To change your billing address, login and edit your details in the settings section.
